title: Petition to put an hp bar on yasuo's wind wall
body: I feel his wind wall is too good at choking out ranged champs at times making them utterly useless in fights, I believe wind wall should be in fact used to block important things like veigar ult. jihn ult, jinx w, but it should have hp aswell to prevent your adc from being useless for 5 seconds or having to be in a poor position of aa, imo it should start with 2 hp, scale to 3 at rank 3, and 4 at rank 5

Riot has said that they don't want that kind of gameplay with Yasuo's wall. They want it to be a tool to force repositioning, and making it breakable presents players with gameplay options that Riot doesn't want. It would be like if you could break Olaf's CC immunity of his ult if you hit him with enough CC; it provides unclear gameplay for Olaf's opponent and unclear value for Olaf himself. Not to mention that it would make his wall practically useless against things like MF ult which it is explicitly designed to counter.

While I'm not one of the people on the "YASUO'S OP NERFNERFNERFNERFNERFNERF" train, I do think his Windwall should have a limit to the number of nullified attacks. So instead of being able to target the wall, it just loses 1 HP with every hit it nullifies. 
In-lane this change wouldn't really do to much because how how slow it takes a ranged champion to break through it. By the time they'd throw 3 attacks (going off of the original post's Hp numbers for lane phase) the wall would pretty much be gone (except for multi-hitting spells like Syndra's and MF's ults). Later in the game however, during teamfights is where this nerf would come into play, making it so you can't just perfectly block everything with just a single button click. 
It could still be used the same as now with reaction W's, but can't just block off all ranged attacks if your team focus fires through it.

This is what I'm getting at, a poorly placed wind wall can still win you the game as it currently stands, you want to use wind wall as a defensive tool for when champs use powerful ults like mf or jhin, but it shouldn't just be used to block an adcs aa's to screw them over, as I feel this is why he gets so much hate as a ranged champ will either have to re-position somewhere dangerous or walk through the wall, both of which will result in them dying 9 times out of 10
